description: Try our easy to follow Minced-Beef Wellington recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Beef wellington,High fibre,High protein,Christmas,Tree nut free,Mince,Low sugar,Budget,Beef,Peanut free
name: Minced-Beef Wellington Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter in a frying pan. Add mushroom and thyme and cook for 5 minutes or until golden. Set aside. Combine breadcrumbs, mince, onion, paste, egg and garlic in a bowl.

Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Shape meat mixture into a log, about 30cm long. Join 2 sheets of the pastry together and press seam together firmly. Place 1/4 of the drained mushroom in the centre of pastry. Place mince on top. Press remaining mushroom on top of the mince.

Fold pastry over to enclose. Place onto a baking tray, seam-side down and tuck under the ends. Lightly brush egg over the pastry. Cut the remaining pastry sheet into 1cm-wide strips and use to decorate log in a criss-cross pattern.
Bake for 40 minutes or until golden. Cut beef wellington into thick slices and serve with green beans.
